about_the_game: Obscura Programming is a collection of “production music” made for the TV programs in the game. Many of these tunes are shorter and have a mysterious, ethereal mood. If you fancy hearing the music that backs the documentary and bumps on the TV station, this is the album for you!
detailed_description: Obscura Programming is a collection of “production music” made for the TV programs in the game. Many of these tunes are shorter and have a mysterious, ethereal mood. If you fancy hearing the music that backs the documentary and bumps on the TV station, this is the album for you!
name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm: Obscura Programming (OST)

package_groups.name: default
